biotools.summary:
a comprehensive pan-species database on RNA-binding proteins, their interactions and functions.

RBP2GO is a comprehensive database dedicated to the analysis of RNA-binding proteins, their interactions and functions. RBP2GO offers three search options for each species, which can be accessed via the sidebar under SEARCH SPECIES. More details can be found in the HELP menu.

bioschemas.name: RBP2GO
